name: Niki in the Ship
description:
Niki in The Ship is a first-person exploration game set on a planet where a god keeps you in prison. As Niki, you will travel around the planet with your ship, visiting beautiful places and trying to find a way to reveal secrets. On your journey, you will interact with different characters and complete some tasks to achieve your single goal: defeating a god.

Key Features

  • A short game that lasts around two hours
  • Gorgeous soundtrack
  • An adventure game made by a solo developer
